item.title: Grappling with multiple remotes in git-tfs
item.description: If you happen to be one of the many people in the unfortunate situation to be stuck working with TFS source control on a daily basis and gaze longingly at the folks using Git or Mercurial wishing you could have some of that distributed goodness for your very own self, I am here to tell you that all is not lost. There are a couple ways you can work with a distributed version control system along side TFS and try and reduce the pain associated with TFS.
